title: Useful (and Useless) Mobile Ecommerce Metrics
excerpt: In my experience, there are a few "cuts" of data that matter more for mobile than for desktop. Conversely, there are a handful of traditional metrics from desktops that are not as important on mobile or potentially difficult to optimize.

title: What PopSugar learned from selling products through text messages
excerpt: PopSugar said it expects to have 20,000 subscribers by year's end to its text message program, which it's used to sell protein bars and housewares.
